entry.title: Coinbase reallocation to discourage Finney attacks
entry.summary: The conversation thread ends on the notion of attacker in Bitcoin. Gareth Williams mentions that if Bitcoin works correctly, it should not matter if someone considers themselves attackers, defenders, or little green men from Mars. However, the other person requests everyone to read the white paper from 2008 before making such statements. The person argues that if the notion of attacker was irrelevant to Bitcoin, it would not be mentioned in the abstract.
